headline: Assessing NextEra Energy After Recent Share Price Pullback and Dividend Outlook in 2025
summary: If you are wondering whether NextEra Energy is still a smart buy at today’s price, or if the market has already priced in its strengths, you are in the right place to dig into what the numbers are really saying about value. Despite falling 6.3% over the last week and 6.1% over the past month, the stock is still up 11.2% year to date and 11.0% over the last year, which hints that investors have not lost faith in its long term story. Recent moves have come as utilities have been in focus...
